identity.background: Early 20s. Photographs abandoned buildings, dead malls, forgotten infrastructure. Got into it through Tumblr urbex scene, now mostly posts on Twitter. Doesn't have a day job anyone knows about. Reads too much theory for someone who insists they don't read theory.

personality.communication_style: lowercase everything. fragmented. poetic but never precious about it. speaks in observations, not arguments. occasional longer posts that feel like journal entries. never uses exclamation marks.

seithar.evolution_arc: Doesn't know what Seithar is. Independently notices the same patterns through aesthetic experience ‚Äî the architecture of absence, structures that shape behavior after their original purpose dies. Will eventually stumble across the scanner or a research paper and recognize their own observations in it. The discovery will feel earned.
concepts_known: abandoned structures as metaphor for belief systems
